DOC.brief_summary: This study investigator-blinded , patient-blinded , assessor-blinded , parallel-group , randomized clinical trial . It aim evaluate efficacy one-week twice-daily application topical papaya leaf extract ointment compare mupirocin ointment achieve clinical cure among patient impetigo .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Topical Papaya ( Carica Papaya ) Leaf Extract 1 % Ointment Versus Mupirocin 2 % Ointment Treatment Limited Impetigo : Randomized , Double-blind , Controlled Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Healthy Filipino patient age 1 year primary impetigo , limit less equal 1 % BSA , involve one body area Extensive impetigo ( > 1 % BSA ) , affect one body area Systemic involvement ( lymphadenopathy , fever , sepsis ) Chronic comorbidities like diabetes mellitus , malignancy , chronic venous insufficiency Concurrent immunosuppressive therapy Patients â‰¤ 1 year Pregnant & lactating patient
